title: Message Supporting Fundraising Drive for the Jewish Hospital of Brooklyn, New York.
text:
My dear Mr. Abelman:

The maintenance of the service of our hospitals is an imperative need, and I am glad to bespeak the generosity of all people of good-will in support of these institutions which minister so unselfishly to suffering humanity. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Max Abelman, 408 St. Johns Place, Brooklyn, N.Y.]
